name: FIRESHELL® F5E
description: FIRESHELL® F5E is a proprietary non-flammable, intumescing (expands up to 2000%), flexible, ductile, elastomeric coating that is suitable for interior or exterior use. It is a non-toxic, water based, drain safe, no fuming product. FIRESHELL® passes ASTM E119 - 1 and 2 hour wall tests, UL263 - 1 and 2 hour wall tests, and E84 class A certified. It is a waterbased one part coating system that comes light gray and black but can be custom colored. This coating can be latex or oil based topcoated.
